metadata.name: In Motion
metadata.description:
“In Motion” (Audiovisual Pairings: Album 2-12) is the title track of Studio Nouveau’s second album of multimedia music pieces. The visual components of the piece include animated 3D modeled environments, digital sculptures, and AI generated imagery, which are combined into a video format and enhanced with video effects. The music track was composed to reference sounds, melodies, and textures used in all 11 of the previous tracks on the album. Also included in the piece is the Ethereum blockchain transaction information for the tokenization of each piece on the album. Track list: Catalyst (SUPR 15282), Perspectives: I. Labyrinth (BNFT 72), Perspectives: II. Sanctum (BNFT 73), Prelude and Fugue: I. Ritual (SUPR 18429), Prelude and Fugue: II. Ascension (SUPR 22531), Electronic Sonata: I. Allegro (MKT2 64,458), Electronic Sonata: II. Andante (MKT2 64,460), Electronic Sonata: III. Rondo, Finale (MKT2 64,464), Portals: I. Departure (DIBS 148), Portals: II. Arrival (DIBS 149), Portals: III. Singularity (DIBS 150), In Motion (SNV 1)

Video: ipfs.io/ipfs/Qmcky4mRhba3nQunHofibzvBSMhBhg4BkTzdjdwLYXPkSm
